Functions
fza_fnc_padString
Description

Pads a string to ensure that it is within a fixed size

_to being string is slightly more performant

Parameters
_str

(String) The string to pad or trim

_to

(String or Number) the expected output size as a number or a string of n characters to use as blank spaces

_right

(Bool) (Optional) (Default: false) whether the spaces should be placed on the right

Returns

A padded string

Examples
["test", 5] call fza_fnc_padString
// " test"

["test", 5, true] call fza_fnc_padString
// "test "

["test", 3] call fza_fnc_padString
// "est"

["test", 3, true] call fza_fnc_padString
// "tes"

["test", "     "] call fza_fnc_padString
// " test"

["test", "     ", true] call fza_fnc_padString
// "test "
Author

mattysmith22
